verses.verse: And God <WH430> spoke <WH1696> all <WH3605> these <WH428> words, <WH1697> saying, <WH559>
I am the LORD <WH3068> your God, <WH430> which <WH834> have brought <WH3318> you out of the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> out of the house <WH1004> of bondage. <WH5650>
You shall have no <WH3808> other <WH312> gods <WH430> before <WH5921> <WH6440> me.

You shall not make <WH6213> to you any graven <WH6459> image, <WH6754> or any <WH3605> likeness <WH8544> of any thing that is in heaven <WH8064> above, <WH4605> or that is in the earth <WH776> beneath, <WH8478> or that is in the water <WH4325> under <WH8478> the earth. <WH776>

You shall not bow <WH7812> down <WH7812> yourself to them, nor <WH3808> serve <WH5647> them: for I the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> am a jealous <WH7067> God, <WH410> visiting <WH6485> the iniquity <WH5771> of the fathers <WH1> on the children <WH1121> to the third <WH8029> and fourth <WH7256> generation of them that hate <WH8130> me;
And showing <WH6213> mercy <WH2617> to thousands <WH505> of them that love <WH157> me, and keep <WH8104> my commandments. <WH4687>

You shall not take <WH5375> the name <WH8034> of the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> in vain; <WH7723> for the LORD <WH3068> will not hold him guiltless <WH5352> that takes <WH5375> his name <WH8034> in vain. <WH7723>
Remember <WH2142> the sabbath <WH7676> day, <WH3117> to keep <WH6942> it holy. <WH6942>
Six <WH8337> days <WH3117> shall you labor, <WH5647> and do <WH6213> all <WH3605> your work: <WH4399>

But the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> is the sabbath <WH7676> of the LORD <WH3068> your God: <WH430> in it you shall not do <WH6213> any <WH3605> work, <WH4399> you, nor your son, <WH1121> nor your daughter, <WH1323> your manservant, <WH5650> nor your maidservant, <WH519> nor your cattle, <WH929> nor your stranger <WH1616> that is within your gates: <WH8179>

For in six <WH8337> days <WH3117> the LORD <WH3068> made <WH6213> heaven <WH8064> and earth, <WH776> the sea, <WH3220> and all <WH3605> that in them is, and rested <WH5117> the seventh <WH7637> day: <WH3117> why <WH5921> <WH3651> the LORD <WH3068> blessed <WH1288> the sabbath <WH7676> day, <WH3117> and hallowed <WH6942> it.
Honor <WH3513> your father <WH1> and your mother: <WH517> that your days <WH3117> may be long <WH748> on the land <WH127> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> gives <WH5414> you.
You shall not kill. <WH7523>
You shall not commit <WH5003> adultery. <WH5003>
You shall not steal. <WH1589>
You shall not bear <WH6030> false <WH8267> witness <WH5707> against your neighbor. <WH7453>

You shall not covet <WH2530> your neighbor's <WH7453> house, <WH1004> you shall not covet <WH2530> your neighbor's <WH7453> wife, <WH802> nor his manservant, <WH5650> nor his maidservant, <WH519> nor his ox, <WH7794> nor his ass, <WH2543> nor any <WH3605> thing that is your neighbor's. <WH7453>

And all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> saw <WH7200> the thunder, <WH6963> and the lightning, <WH3940> and the noise <WH6963> of the trumpet, <WH7782> and the mountain <WH2022> smoking: <WH6226> and when the people <WH5971> saw <WH7200> it, they removed, <WH5128> and stood <WH5975> afar <WH7350> off.
And they said <WH559> to Moses, <WH4872> Speak <WH1696> you with us, and we will hear: <WH8085> but let not God <WH430> speak <WH1696> with us, lest <WH6435> we die. <WH4191>

And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> to the people, <WH5971> Fear <WH3372> not: for God <WH430> is come <WH935> to prove <WH5254> you, and that his fear <WH3374> may be before <WH5921> your faces, <WH6440> that you sin <WH2398> not.
And the people <WH5971> stood <WH5975> afar <WH7350> off, and Moses <WH4872> drew near <WH5066> to the thick darkness <WH6205> where <WH834> <WH8033> God <WH430> was.

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> to Moses, <WH4872> Thus <WH3541> you shall say <WH559> to the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> You have seen <WH7200> that I have talked <WH1696> with you from heaven. <WH8064>
You shall not make <WH6213> with me gods <WH430> of silver, <WH3701> neither <WH3808> shall you make <WH6213> to you gods <WH430> of gold. <WH2091>

An altar <WH4196> of earth <WH127> you shall make <WH6213> to me, and shall sacrifice <WH2076> thereon <WH5921> your burnt <WH5930> offerings, and your peace <WH8002> offerings, your sheep, <WH6629> and your oxen: <WH1241> in all <WH3605> places <WH4725> where <WH834> I record <WH2142> my name <WH8034> I will come <WH935> to you, and I will bless <WH1288> you.

And if <WH518> you will make <WH6213> me an altar <WH4196> of stone, <WH68> you shall not build <WH1129> it of hewn <WH1496> stone: for if you lift <WH5130> up your tool <WH2719> on it, you have polluted <WH2490> it.
Neither <WH3808> shall you go <WH5927> up by steps <WH4609> to my altar, <WH4196> that your nakedness <WH6172> be not discovered <WH1540> thereon. <WH5921>
